  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static double
    boseEinstein(double frequency, double temperature)
    Bose-Einstein distribution for phonons. n(ω) = 1 / (exp(ℏω/k_B T) - 1)
    static double
    conductivityFromBandGap(double sigma0, double bandGap, double temperature)
    Band gap from semiconductor conductivity temperature dependence. σ ∝ exp(-E_g / 2k_B T)
    static double
    debyeFrequency(double soundVelocity, double atomDensity)
    Debye frequency. ω_D = v_s * (6π²n)^(1/3)
    static double
    debyeTemperature(double debyeFrequency)
    Debye temperature. θ_D = ℏω_D / k_B
    static double
    densityOfStates(double electronDensity, double fermiEnergy)
    Density of states at Fermi level (3D free electrons). g(E_F) = 3n / (2E_F)
    static double
    drudeConductivity(double carrierDensity, double relaxationTime, double effectiveMass)
    Drude conductivity. σ = n e² τ / m*
    static double
    effectiveMass(double bandCurvature)
    Effective mass from band curvature. m* = ℏ² / (d²E/dk²)
    static double
    fermiDirac(double E, double mu, double temperature)
    Fermi-Dirac distribution. f(E) = 1 / (exp((E-μ)/k_B T) + 1)
    static double
    fermiEnergy(double electronDensity)
    Fermi energy for free electron gas.
    static double
    fermiVelocity(double electronDensity)
    Fermi velocity. v_F = ℏk_F / m
    static double
    hallCoefficient(double carrierDensity, boolean isElectron)
    Hall coefficient.
    static double
    intrinsicCarrierConcentration(double Nc, double Nv, double bandGap, double temperature)
    Intrinsic carrier concentration. n_i = √(N_c * N_v) * exp(-E_g / 2k_B T)
    static double
    mobility(double conductivity, double carrierDensity)
    Mobility from conductivity and carrier density. μ = σ / (n * e)
    static double
    phononEnergy(double frequency)
    Phonon energy.

  • Method Details

    • fermiEnergy

      public static double fermiEnergy(double electronDensity)
      Fermi energy for free electron gas. E_F = (ℏ²/2m) * (3π²n)^(2/3)
      Parameters:
      electronDensity - n in m⁻³
      Returns:
      Fermi energy (J)

    • fermiVelocity

      public static double fermiVelocity(double electronDensity)
      Fermi velocity. v_F = ℏk_F / m

    • densityOfStates

      public static double densityOfStates(double electronDensity, double fermiEnergy)
      Density of states at Fermi level (3D free electrons). g(E_F) = 3n / (2E_F)

    • fermiDirac

      public static double fermiDirac(double E, double mu, double temperature)
      Fermi-Dirac distribution. f(E) = 1 / (exp((E-μ)/k_B T) + 1)

    • debyeFrequency

      public static double debyeFrequency(double soundVelocity, double atomDensity)
      Debye frequency. ω_D = v_s * (6π²n)^(1/3)
      Parameters:
      soundVelocity - Speed of sound (m/s)
      atomDensity - Number density of atoms (m⁻³)

    • debyeTemperature

      public static double debyeTemperature(double debyeFrequency)
      Debye temperature. θ_D = ℏω_D / k_B

    • phononEnergy

      public static double phononEnergy(double frequency)
      Phonon energy. E = ℏω

    • boseEinstein

      public static double boseEinstein(double frequency, double temperature)
      Bose-Einstein distribution for phonons. n(ω) = 1 / (exp(ℏω/k_B T) - 1)

    • conductivityFromBandGap

      public static double conductivityFromBandGap(double sigma0, double bandGap, double temperature)
      Band gap from semiconductor conductivity temperature dependence. σ ∝ exp(-E_g / 2k_B T)

    • intrinsicCarrierConcentration

      public static double intrinsicCarrierConcentration(double Nc, double Nv, double bandGap, double temperature)
      Intrinsic carrier concentration. n_i = √(N_c * N_v) * exp(-E_g / 2k_B T)

    • effectiveMass

      public static double effectiveMass(double bandCurvature)
      Effective mass from band curvature. m* = ℏ² / (d²E/dk²)

    • hallCoefficient

      public static double hallCoefficient(double carrierDensity, boolean isElectron)
      Hall coefficient. R_H = 1 / (n * e) for electrons

    • mobility

      public static double mobility(double conductivity, double carrierDensity)
      Mobility from conductivity and carrier density. μ = σ / (n * e)

    • drudeConductivity

      public static double drudeConductivity(double carrierDensity, double relaxationTime, double effectiveMass)
      Drude conductivity. σ = n e² τ / m*
